# [FEAT] Email Templates

## Labels
`customization`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement customizable email templates for all system-generated emails.

## Requirements

### Template Types
- Ticket confirmation
- Ticket update notification
- Agent reply notification
- Status change notification
- CSAT survey
- Password reset
- Welcome email
- Assignment notification

### Template Editor
- Rich text editor
- HTML editing
- Preview functionality
- Mobile preview
- Test email sending

### Template Variables
- Ticket fields
- User fields
- Agent fields
- Organization fields
- Custom fields
- Dynamic content blocks

### Template Features
- Multi-language templates
- Brand-specific templates
- Template versioning
- Template cloning
- A/B testing

### Email Styling
- Header/footer customization
- Color scheme
- Font styling
- Image embedding
- Social links

### Delivery Settings
- Send conditions
- Recipient rules
- CC/BCC options
- Reply-to settings
- Unsubscribe links

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk supports customizable email templates for all customer communications.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All template types available
- [ ] Template editor functional
- [ ] Variables work correctly
- [ ] Multi-language support
- [ ] Preview and test work
